name: Meta Capital
description: Meta Capital presents a simple way for DeFi users to benefit from investments in Yield Farms, NFTâ€™s, and Metaverse land. By handling the time-consuming and often challenging work related to bridging, farming, and investing, MCAP returns yields (many of which are only available in other Layer 1 chains like FTM, MATIC, and AVAX) to its users on the ETH network. By holding MCAP , the user earns a share of profits from the MCAP investment portfolio.
